channel.title: Npc Help
channel.description:
Hello, I come once again asking for help for my npcs. How would i be able to make Npc Vs Npc combat? Surely people have figured it out by now. If you know, please post asap.
~i vitiello i~

item.title: Npc Help
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“masta XY, post:17, topic:251493”][quote author=firewithin3 link=topic=331994.msg2591040#msg2591040 date=1229755574]

[quote author=masta XY link=topic=331994.msg2591039#msg2591039 date=1229755480]

[quote author=firewithin3 link=topic=331994.msg2591038#msg2591038 date=1229755426]

[quote author=masta XY link=topic=331994.msg2591034#msg2591034 date=1229755299]

[quote author=firewithin3 link=topic=331994.msg2591013#msg2591013 date=1229754553]

Make a new class and are you wanting it so the npc’s attack each other like on rs where the gnomes and the khazard people fight?
[/quote]Fixt.

Its not a class… its a handler.
[/quote]Handler is the retarded mscper term. It actually is class, since every java file starts with “public class” or “private class” or “class”.

Make a new class and are you wanting it so the npc’s attack each other like on rs where the gnomes and the khazard people fight?
[/quote]Fixt.

Its not a class… its a handler.

A class is basically the same as a Java file…
[/quote]A class is a java file, please read part 1 of this post.

w.e, it would make more sense telling him its a handler which in some-what helpful way will help him know what it is.
[/quote]Too bad, it’s retarded and invalid and is just teaching them wrong. If you’re going to teach them, teach them correctly.

First- Most of the kids on these forums use the term ‘handler’ in most cases if he used ‘class’ it would confuse him in the directness of following tutorials.[/quote]Well, calling it a handler is wrong. Just call it a class. If he doesn’t know what a class is he should read a book or tutorial on java before attempting to code a server in java.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Help
item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:
@masta_XY wrote:

Make a new class and are you wanting it so the npc’s attack each other like on rs where the gnomes and the khazard people fight?
[/quote]Fixt.

Its not a class… its a handler.
[/quote]Handler is the retarded mscper term. It actually is class, since every java file starts with “public class” or “private class” or “class”.

[quote author=chassy13 link=topic=331994.msg2591036#msg2591036 date=1229755388]

Make a new class and are you wanting it so the npc’s attack each other like on rs where the gnomes and the khazard people fight?
[/quote]Fixt.

Its not a class… its a handler.

A class is basically the same as a Java file…
[/quote]A class is a java file, please read part 1 of this post.

w.e, it would make more sense telling him its a handler which in some-what helpful way will help him know what it is.
[/quote]Too bad, it’s retarded and invalid and is just teaching them wrong. If you’re going to teach them, teach them correctly.[/quote]

First- Most of the kids on these forums use the term ‘handler’ in most cases if he used ‘class’ it would confuse him in the directness of following tutorials.

item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“masta XY, post:11, topic:251493”][quote author=firewithin3 link=topic=331994.msg2591013#msg2591013 date=1229754553]

Make a new class and are you wanting it so the npc’s attack each other like on rs where the gnomes and the khazard people fight?
[/quote]Fixt.

Its not a class… its a handler.[/quote]Handler is the retarded mscper term. It actually is class, since every java file starts with “public class” or “private class” or “class”. Handler is an invalid naming for it.

[quote=“chassy13, post:13, topic:251493”][quote author=masta XY link=topic=331994.msg2591034#msg2591034 date=1229755299]

Make a new class and are you wanting it so the npc’s attack each other like on rs where the gnomes and the khazard people fight?

A class is basically the same as a Java file…[/quote]A class is a java file, please read part 1 of this post.

Accually i new he would say it again =][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2008, 12:22:25 am[/size][hr][quote=“masta XY, post:4, topic:251493”]Just copy the stuff from the npc vs. player handler and change it so it will be for npc vs. npc[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:

[/quote]
Wow thats a tough one.[/quote]
He didn’t literally mean ‘say that again’, its called knowing it and repluring the words.

[quote=“1 vitiello 1, post:6, topic:251493”][quote author=masta XY link=topic=331994.msg2590989#msg2590989 date=1229753884]
Make a new handler and are you wanting it so the npc’s attack each other like on rs where the gnomes and the khazard people fight?
[/quote]

Yes thats right.[/quote]

Just copy the stuff from the npc vs. player handler and change it so it will be for npc vs. npc
